snippet: Passing a symbolic resolution Wednesday, Chicago’s City Council unanimously opposed naming a federal building in Washington after Eliot Ness, the prohibition-era agent whose team of lawmen in Chicago inspired “The Untouchables” book, movie and...
abstract: Chicago's City Council opposes naming a federal building in Washington after Eliot Ness, Prohibition-era agent whose team inspired a book, movie and television series; resolution is unanimously passed by the council and is largely symbolic.
lead_paragraph: Passing a symbolic resolution Wednesday, Chicago’s City Council unanimously opposed naming a federal building in Washington after Eliot Ness, the prohibition-era agent whose team of lawmen in Chicago inspired “The Untouchables” book, movie and television series.

headline.main: Illinois: Council Goes on Record to Oppose Honor for Eliot Ness
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Council Goes on Record to Oppose Honor for Eliot Ness

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
